document_data.name: Verdashir Academy
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Verdashir Academy''', also known as the '''Dervish Academy''', was a martial academy located in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It could be found in the [[Outer City]] district of [[Little Calimshan]].

The academy offered training for [[Calishite]] warriors, in the tradition of their [[Calimshan|homeland]]. Outsiders were only admitted to the academy if they proved to already be exceptionally skilled in combat.
